original_title: The Unexpected Destruction of Elaborately Engineered Artifacts
overview: Alan Kelley's eagerly awaited edit of the largest Survival Research Laboratories event ever. SRL adds 5000 spectators , 60 tons of machines , 50 srl members working tirelessly on site for 3 weeks, at an Austin, Texas racetrack to equal major mayhem. Artfully condensed on video to 18 min.
tagline: A Misguided Adventure in Risk Eradication, Happening Without Known Cause In Connection with Events that are Not Necessarily Related
title: The Unexpected Destruction of Elaborately Engineered Artifacts
